title: Thomas Stone National Historic Site: Accessibility
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility             Accessibility         NPS  The Visitor Center is ADA compliant and completely accessible.   The park film is close-captioned.   Haberdeventure, the restored mansion of Thomas Stone, is completely accessible.   Trails between the visitor center and mansion, including to and through the Stone Family Burial Ground are completely accessible.   Vehicles with appropriate handicapped credentials can drive to the mansion.   Trails through the rest of the park traverse uneven and hilly ground and are not completely accessible.
